author: ajsutton
content: Yeah I've seen pyrmont bouncing around in participation a fair bit.  All our validators are running but scheduled to exit (you Prysm folk got into the queue first so we'll be waiting a while).  As more of our validators exit a greater percentage of the network will be unmaintained nodes so it will stop finalizing eventually but that doesn't explain these sudden drops.

author: paulhauner
content: We've also been moving our Pyrmont validators to new infrastructure, that's a potential reason for issues. However, that big drop was the middle of the night for us so it's unlikely we had validators intentionally down then.
